text: Harris bin Mohd Sallehmemmynemo.com "Datuk Seri Panglima Harris Bin Mohd Salleh awarded title of Tan Sri by Agong" (born 4 November 1930) is a Malaysian politician. He was the sixth Chief Minister of the state of Sabah in Malaysia from 1976 to 1985.Åsgård, Björn."A Study of the Kadazan Dusun, Sabah, Malaysia" , Ethnic Awareness and Development, p. 47. Retrieved 8 March 2007. He was also the president for Parti Berjaya. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Malaysian politicians Category:People from Sabah
title: Harris Salleh
